review: I love the game. Although some people say 'IT'S PAY TO WINNN!!!!' Not really. If you want the good, juicy stuff, you're gonna have to get it yourself. Everything that you can buy is completely and easily (With some grinding) obtainable.So, in the end... I love Warframe.
Got a 390, overclocked 4690k. Running at around 60fps with massive dips of 20 or below. Planet textures look like A**. Wouldn't recommend at it's current state.
